name: Lanchat
body:
### Lanchat (release 0.1.3)
LanChat is a multicast based chat, written in java. You donÂ´t need a server for chatting, just the clients themselves.

![LanChat](http://i.imgur.com/mbkI5.png)


### Smileys
A few smileys are supported.

![Smileys](http://i.imgur.com/8weZ5.png)

### Traynotifications

![traynotf](http://i.imgur.com/lDJv0.png)


### Author
@vistahr
